sections.title: Context & Role in Vesta FinOps
sections.goal: Understand interviewee’s responsibilities, how they interact with Vesta FinOps scope, and the operational environment.
sample_questions: Can you walk me through your day-to-day responsibilities within the Vesta FinOps project?
How does your work tie into the company’s mission of cloud-native data & platform engineering for regulated industries?
Which policies or guardrails do you interact with most frequently, and how do they shape your workflows?

sections.title: Current Cloud Cost Optimization Processes
sections.goal: Explore the existing mechanisms, tools, and metrics used in cost optimization, and how they align with company values.
sample_questions: What are the primary KPIs or SLOs you track for cloud cost efficiency?
Could you describe the flow from anomaly detection to budget adjustments?
How do runbooks like RB-FIN-007 Idle Resource Reaper fit into your operational playbook?

sections.title: Cross-Project FinOps Impacts
sections.goal: Identify how FinOps decisions affect other projects in the portfolio, especially those in Build or Scale phases.
sample_questions: Can you give an example of a cost optimization decision in Vesta FinOps that impacted a Build-phase project like Nimbus Observability?
How do you coordinate with SRE or Platform teams when implementing new quotas from RFC-1502?
What’s the process for resolving conflicts between cost guardrails and performance SLAs?

sections.title: Evidence-Driven Decision Making
sections.goal: Understand how the interviewee uses data, runbooks, and RFCs to support or challenge decisions.
sample_questions: Can you describe a recent case where you used evidence from an audit or SLA to justify a cost-related change?
How do you balance historical spend data with forecast models when making decisions?
What unwritten heuristics do you rely on when deciding whether to enforce a budget cap?

sections.title: Trade-offs, Risks, and Future Planning
sections.goal: Discuss trade-offs between cost savings, performance, and compliance; explore risk management and forward-looking strategies.
sample_questions: What’s the most challenging trade-off you’ve faced between cost optimization and SLA commitments?
How do you quantify and communicate the blast radius of a cost-saving measure?
What future capabilities would you like to see in Vesta FinOps to better manage these trade-offs?
